title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: On linux, running build 20011127 (does not happen on build 20011116 on Nt2000). When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the tool items move below the label. However, so does the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X). If it starts moving around, I think users will get confused.
OB: The close button moves down when the view is resized smaller on Linux with build 20011127.
EB: The close button should remain in its original position even when the view is resized smaller. It should not move below the label.
SR:
1. Open the Navigator view.
2. On Linux, with build 20011127, resize the view to make it smaller.
3. Observe that the close button moves down below the label.
